    👋 About Me

    Proactive and goal-oriented Computer Engineering student with strong communication skills and a solid foundation in technical and software development. I have gained hands-on engineering experience through both academic projects and professional roles, including my time as an Engineering Intern at Indus Automation and as a Web Developer & Analyst at Manitoba Municipal Relations. Passionate about leveraging my expertise in IoT, Full-Stack Development, AWS, VBA Macros, and Design Solution Programming to develop innovative and efficient solutions for real-world challenges.

    💼 Currently:

    • Computer Engineering Co-op Student at UoM Graduating May 2025
    • Engineering Project Coordinator Co-op Student at New Flyer

    💼 Experience

    May 2024 – Present

    Engineering Project Coordinator – New Flyer

    • Developed automation tools for project tracking and forecasting.
    • Engineered a BoM management system, improving tracking accuracy.
    • Learned CAN protocol and J1939 for vehicle networks.
    • Designed an automated budget forecasting tool, integrating real-time data.
    • Facilitated cross-functional team communication for project efficiency.

    May – Dec 2024, May – Sept 2022

    Engineering Aide – Indus Automation

    • Designed a smartphone app to remotely control S71200/1500 PLC using AWS Services.
    • Programmed the PLC for MQTT-based communication with AWS IoT Broker.
    • Developed a Node-RED solution on IoT2050 for automated workflows.
    • Engineered a cross-platform pump/lift station management app with:
    - User authentication & role-based access.
    - Real-time monitoring & dynamic UI for station oversight.
    - MQTT secure communication & automated alerts (email/SMS).
    • Built an automated SharePoint project tracking system in Excel with VBA.
    • Automated Excel-based take-off sheets and integrated PLC data with AutoCAD Electrical.
    • Created Windows automation scripts (.bat files) for system optimization.
    • Implemented AutoCAD Auto LISP solutions for ladder reference tagging.

    Jan 2022 - May 2022

    STEP - Web Developer / Business Analyst – Manitoba Municipal Relations

    • Developed a SharePoint collaboration site with interactive HTML pages.
    • Automated SQL data extraction, batch job supervision, and system documentation.
    • Created FDM application test scripts and user manuals for seamless adoption.

    📂 Projects

    PLC IoT App

    Designed and implemented a smartphone application to remotely interface with, control setpoints, and manage outputs of a programmable logic controller using S71200/1500 PLC, AWS Services, and a cross-platform application.

    ▶Demo Soon

    IoT-Based River Depth Monitoring

    Designed and implemented an IoT-based Lake/River Depth Measurement and Monitoring System with sonar technology and cloud integration for real-time depth monitoring, GPS navigation, path mapping, and ML model for hazard differentiation.

    ▶Demo Soon

    Full-Stack Career Platform

    A career platform with job portal, recommendation engine, and live quizzing event using MERN Stack, CI/CD pipelines, Docker containerization, security analysis, and load testing.

    ▶Demo Soon

    Broom Buddy

    Engineered a technology solution for deaf curlers consisting of a single handheld controller and a broom-mountable LED ring to convey sweeping instructions using ESP-Now, power-saving modes, and a 12-bit ADC.

    ▶ Watch Demo

    Urban Tech App

    Developed a user-friendly online store and static website with features like scrolling interface, specifications, cart functionality, checkout process, account management, product recommendations, and category views.

    ▶ Urban Tech Demo Static Website

    Stopwatch

    Designed and implemented using DE-10 boards, FGPAs, and Verilog.

    MusicOSet

    Designed and implemented a database encapsulating albums, artists, and songs, and created a front-end command-line interface for database access and usage.

    ▶View DB Project Report
